transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Hello? Yeah, hello, I'm sitting at Vikrant here. Sorry, am I speaking with Vikrant Gupta here? Yes, yes, yes, Vikrant calling you from AMD Student. Okay, I can see that you're looking to book a student accommodation for your University of University College London. Correct? Yeah, yeah, yeah. I've been looking for accommodation. Have you finalized any property yet? I can see that you have checked chapter kings wrong. Sorry, your. Your quality is a bit poor. Could you repeat that, please? Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp? There might be some networking which I'm not able to, you know, provide you a proper conversation. Yeah, on WhatsApp? Yes, on WhatsApp. Okay. Do you have my contact as it is or. Yeah, I do have that. I do have your WhatsApp number. Okay, yeah. Okay, that'll be great.
